description:
Having defeated the serial killer Umbra, they search the building, but Shinyao has vanished. While searching for her whereabouts, Ton learns the four employees of the cafe are members of the Twilights, an organization that seeks coexistence between humans and shadows, and Cafe Forbidden is the organization`s London branch.
They blindly continue the search for Shinyao, but only Luke seems to recognize a trace left behind by the culprit. Luke secretly heads out to meet the man who kidnapped Shinyao... where he meets Chris, a young man he knows well.
Source: crunchyroll
